website_summaries.verdict: Visually appealing as any lifestyle Puma sneaker could be, most of the shoppers agreed about the Puma Roma Suede’s eye-pleasing aspect. Some also shared that it offers ample comfort. To top the positives off, it can be purchased at a budget-friendly price.However, its durability is possibly not its greatest feature. But if searching for a sleek footwear during casual workdays or other sedentary activities, the Puma Roma Suede is a good purchase.
pros: Some of the reviewers advise that they found this casual sneaker comfortable
For several purchasers of the Puma Roma Suede, it has a classic, elegant and stylish exterior that is an eye-pleaser
Its inexpensive price tag has been appreciated by a number of shoppers
A couple of purchasers have shared that the footwear looks exactly like its photos online
As per a customer, whether paired with jeans or shorts, the Roma Suede looks great
The suede upper looks and feels soothing, according to a couple of wearers
This low-top is described as light on foot by a few users
cons: A considerable number of customers attest that wear and tear signs are clearly noticeable after a short time of use
A few users mention about the shoe being too narrow for their feet

customer_reviews.title: PUMA HEAVEN....HAVE 4 PAIRS NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE PUMAS ARE HEAVEN..SWEET SUEDE WITH WHITE PUMA LOGO AND GREEN AND GOLD TONGUE LOGO...ONE OF MY FAVS!!!...JUST CLEANED THEM WITH BICKMORE SUEDE CLEANER AND BAMMM EVEN BETTER AND DARKER...THESE KICK SOME SERIOUS ASS MY FRIEND!!!!...THANK YOU AMAZON ONCE AGAIN YOU NEVER FAIL!!!..
customer_reviews.author: Mike From R.I.

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable shoe - Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Puma shoes for a long time, this was my fifth pair. I hoped I would get a lightweight, comfortable shoe I could wear all around town. At first, I was impressed. However, not even a month after usual wear, the fabric on this shoe has started tearing on the sides. First it was only on the left shoe, and then the right side one also ripped open. If I had damaged the shoe some way it would be one thing, but I noticed it just after walking around town. I cannot recommend this shoe for its poor materials in use. They are not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Although the fit is a little tight around the ball of the foot, they're suede, they'll stretch out and fit fine after a few miles. Good transaction. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Fairbourn

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I feel this shoes is too small for me. Normally I wear US9 for Nike and Adidas. But Puma shoes seems smaller than that. Product quality is very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Terry SG

customer_reviews.title: Teenage Kicks
customer_reviews.text: I suspected these might be narrow from other reviews. I usually do an 81⁄2. They were too small so I went a half size up. Yes they are tight/narrow but not tight enough they won't work.
customer_reviews.author: I AM MICK

customer_reviews.title: A little on the narrow side but otherwise awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the look but they are a bit narrow and I already have a narrow foot. I went a half size bigger than I normally wear and they're good for fit.
customer_reviews.author: salsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pumas!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a solid product, shipping and delivery. I enjoy it daily and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: George Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made junk!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe on my right foot feels like there's something wrong inside and is really uncomfortable. I bought the shoes for hanging out relaxing but they're so crappy I'll hang out barefooted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Used one time out of box on carpet at a "Red Shoe Ball". Sole is coming off already!!!! return window closed? Should be able to return for product defects still!!!!
customer_reviews.author: donald jahnke

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but very small, feels one size smaller than labeled
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, nice quality, but go 1/2 to full size larger as the shoe is quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D Mood

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They look great with shorts or jeans. I wish they had more colors though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe....replaced the blue laces for white ones.....great looking sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: TedG65

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes, really like them .... 5 stars ... and it came 1 week earlier
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes, really like them .... 5 stars ... and it came 1 week earlier
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Classic Puma look and fit
customer_reviews.text: Tight and narrow but very comfy. Most pumas are. Great classic looks
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a good shoe and I will get more.
customer_reviews.author: Willis Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rare color scheme (Man Utd), needed something to match home jerseys
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with a fresh pair of suede Pumas.
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy shade of Red that doesn’t clash with my wardrobe and the summer melon is a sweet accent.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They are good shoes but little to tight but still good shoes
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Instantly my new favorite shoes. They look great and are really comfortable. I know that the leather puma's run a little smaller than the synthetic so I bought a 1/2 size bigger and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish looking shoes for price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoes, very comfortable. I liked them so much I almost want to get a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Roma Suede Sneaker
product_meta.description: From the PUMA archives in 1968, this lightweight training shoe was equipped with comfort enhancing features such as a thick padded tongue and orthopedic arch supports. This version features an all over suede upper for a clean look and feel.
